content: Why should your dog have all the fun when you play fetch? Get in on the action by launching the balls using this dog tennis ball blaster. This NERF-powered blaster comes with four differently colored tennis balls that it can launch up to 50 feet in the air.

Increase your productivity at the office by swapping out your old monitor for this Dell 43″ 4K multi-window monitor. This massive screen comes with features like a wide-angle view up to 178°, while also giving you the option of using it as 4 independent 1080p screens.

Help your clothes dry faster and more efficiently by tossing one of these puffer fish dryer buddies in with your load. They tumble in the dryer to lift and separate your clothes, allowing the air to flow more efficiently while also controlling static and softening fabrics.

Introducing Amazon Key – the revolutionary system that allows you to let total strangers into your home to deliver Amazon packages. This unique yet highly controversial system revamps the entire concept of a front door lock, allowing authorized servicemen inside.

Chill a room temperature canned drink in just 60 seconds using this compact automatic beverage chiller. Simply add a bit of ice, place the can in the main compartment, and watch in amazement as this battery operated appliance cools your drink in 1 minute flat.

Get away with public intoxication this Halloween by hitting the streets dressed in this drunk piggy back ride costume. This hilarious getup creates the illusion your drunken-self is being carried home by a very kind traditionally dressed Bavarian man.

Make your fruits look even more appealing than they are delicious by growing them using these fruit shaping molds. These small polycarbonate molds force your little seedlings to conform to its borders so that your fruit grows in the shape of the container it’s in.

Finally, a paper airplane for the modern age! Now you can build an agile little plane that can actually fly by using this app controlled paper airplane kit. The plane is easy to set up and can perform death-defying maneuvers like barrel rolls, spins, and loops.

Give your trusty ride a thorough cleaning even if you can’t find a hose nearby by going to work with this waterless car wash and wax. It’s made using a chemically engineered formula that leaves your car looking like new while shielding it from water and dirt.

Turn the breakfast table into a delicious crime scene by eating out of this cereal killer bowl. It’s hand crafted from kiln fired ceramic and decorated with bright red markings all over the inside and outside of the bowl designed to look like blood spatter.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Finger Monsters
content: Transform your plain old human fingers into lively monsters using these glow in the dark finger monsters. Just slip these pint-sized two inch monsters over your fingers, turn off the lights, and let the fun begin as the monsters come to life.

This multifunctional grappling hook and claw is a tool no serious outdoorsman should be without. Crafted from stainless steel, this 2-in-1 tool can be used for everything from climbing and towing, to securing your gear using the removable bat gear tie.

This truly wire-free security camera allows you to keep a watchful eye over your home even in areas where there are no power outlets in sight. This battery-powered weatherproof camera records in 1080p and can stream footage directly to your smartphone.

titleEN: Night Time Heat Free Hair Curlers
content: Give your straight locks some much needed volume without harming your hair by going to bed with these night time heat free hair curlers. Simply wrap your hair around these extra-absorbent, memory-foam core curlers to wake up with magnificent curls in the morning.

Keep track of the new year while putting your love of popping bubble sheets to use with this brilliant bubble wrap calendar. Every day that goes by you will get to enjoy the pure bliss of popping a bubble off this clever calendar.

Stop scraping by and take control of your money by reading Broke Millennial. This highly informative read is aimed at teaching perpetually broke 20- and 30-somethings valuable life skills such as how to budget, invest, and manage credit card debt.

Turn yourself into a living, breathing glowstick every time you put on one of these interactive UV light shirts. A specialized UV key chain and laser allow you to create crazy and custom designs and slogans – making it the ideal outfit for any party,concert, or rave.

Construct your very own aerial vehicle from scratch without needing any major tools by using this LEGO flying drone kit. The kit makes it possible to build eye-catching custom models without any programming or soldering required.

Stay organized while showing off your old school gamer roots by installing this Nintendo console key holder in your pad. It conveniently mounts right onto the wall so that you and your player 2 can easily hang your keys using the controller input keychains.

Experience one of your favorite movies like never before by playing this exciting Ghostbusters board game. Based on the plot from Ghostbusters II, you and 3 other players must investigate the mysterious mood slime that’s flooded the city and defeat Vigo.

Commemorate the greatest claymation film of all time by spooking up your home with this Nightmare Before Christmas cuckoo clock. This masterfully handcrafted timepiece depicts Jack Skellington and Sally along with the sinister trio of Lock, Shock, and Barrel.

Create an enchanting nighttime environment in your home by lighting the room with this willow vine light. This curvy, natural looking branch stands at eight feet and comes adorned with 144 little LEDs that emit a soft warm glow ideal for accent lighting.

Transform your plain old human legs into a wonderful mermaid tail by wearing these mermaid fin socks. These vibrant polyester socks come emblazoned with an eye-catching graphic that creates the illusion of a lovely mermaid tail when you place your legs side by side.

Make your restaurant’s dessert menu the talk of the town by adding mini donuts into the mix. This electric automatic donut making machine features a 35 pound oil capacity and can churn out 150 dozen delicious mini donuts per hour.

Cure your smartphone addiction by upgrading your expensive phone to the NoPhone Air. This cost-efficient model comes with an impressive 0 GB storage capacity and an impossibly thin, lightweight design that makes it feel as though you’re not even holding a phone!

titleEN: Star Wars Death Star LEGO Set
content: Fulfill the Empire’s plan of total domination over the galaxy by building your very own Death Star out of LEGOs. This incredibly detailed set measures 16″ all across and comes with over 4,000 pieces – including small props and a cast of over 20 characters.

Enjoy gazing at a dazzling full moon every night of the year by bringing this 3D moon night light into your bedroom. It features an accurate depiction of the moon’s surface and comes with two brightness settings that won’t strain your eyes in the dark.

Take your selfie game up a notch by outfitting your phone with the smartphone selfie ring light. Unlike a regular flash, this circular light comes lined with 36 small and dimmable LEDs, ensuring that you always have the perfect lighting for your selfie.

Snag the prize for best getup at your Halloween party by going dressed in this deluxe Iron Man costume. This officially licensed costume is based on the infamous Mark III suit and features movie accurate details like palm repulsors and a light up arc reactor.

titleEN: Krispy Kreme Jelly Bean Gift Box
content: Ensure you always fall short of your weight loss goals by treating yourself to this Krispy Kreme jelly bean gift box. Each box comes filled with 5 brand new Krispy Kreme themed flavors – cinnamon apple, strawberry, blueberry cake, chocolate, and original glazed.

Procrastinate the day away like never before with the fidget spinner phone. It comes with a 280mAh battery, D20 speaker, and a bearing at the center that lets you spin your compact phone round and round when you’re not making calls.

Spook up your home bar’s appearance a bit by storing your favorite spirit inside this glass skull decanter. Crafted by skilled artisans into the shape of a human skull, this eerie set includes a large 750mL decanter along with 4 accompanying skull shaped glasses.

You can now buy a home on Amazon! These extremely affordable pre-fabricated shipping container homes offer all the comforts of a stationary home like running water, a fully functional bathroom, bedroom, kitchenette, and a cozy living room.

Create a surreal environment in your little one’s room with this whimsical table and stool set. Expertly crafted from heavy duty resin, each piece of furniture comes decorated to resemble overgrown fungi straight from the world of Alice In Wonderland.

Ensure your home is the cleanest in the entire galaxy by placing the Star Wars Powerbot robot vacuum on the job. It boasts 10 watts of suction power, features a design that minimizes clogging, and comes with an onboard speaker that mimics Vader’s breathing.

Give your sad solitary life some meaning and joy by pouring your heart and soul into caring for your little Tamagotchi pet. Famed toymaker Bandai has re-released the Original Tamogatchi – only this time they’re half the size of the original!

Say goodbye to soggy pages when reading poolside by upgrading to the Amazon Oasis waterproof Kindle. It features an ultra slim and lightweight design, a battery that lasts for weeks at a time, a large 7 inch glare-free display, and up to 32 GB of storage.

Carry around all the stuff that won’t fit in your skinny jean pockets by wearing this giant pocket shirt. Each shirt in this fashionable collection comes with a ginormous and sturdy front pocket that is complemented with an eccentric and colorful design.

Create a soothing and inviting atmosphere in any part of your home by turning on a Himalayan salt fire bowl lamp. Each six inch diameter bowl is hand carved from 100% Himalayan salt and is outfitted with a small bulb at the bottom that makes it appear as if the bowl is on fire.

Enjoy a nice hot meal – even if you’re in the middle of nowhere – by preparing it with the GoSun packable solar cooker. It comes fitted with a pair of compound-parabolic reflectors that heat up the cylindrical cooking space so that you can easily steam, bake, or roast your food.

Now you can fly the ship that made the Kessel Run in less than twelve parsecs. A version 1/100th the size, sure, but she’s got it where it counts, kid. With its LED lights and iconic sounds, you’ll be roaring like a Wookiee in no time!

Alexa is now better than ever with the introduction of the Amazon Echo Spot. With its versatile ultra compact design and built-in screen, you’ll be able to make video calls, watch video clips, control wireless devices, in addition to performing a variety of other tasks.

Turn your house into a home of the future by making this touchscreen coffee table the digital heart of your living room. It boasts an ultra sleek 42 inch liquid resistant screen with a 1920 x 1080 resolution along with a 120GB SSD drive.

Handle any task with ease using this stainless steel 40-in-1 multi-tool money clip. Besides keeping your cash organized, it features a slew of tools ranging from a bottle opener to a cord cutter, so you’ll always have the right tool for the job.

Transform yourself into the strangest looking and tallest canine anyone’s ever seen with this pug mask. It features a realistic design complemented with faux fur for added authenticity and comes with a cushioned chin brace that allows the mouth to move while you speak.

Two dessert giants join forces to take you to dessert heaven with these Oreo churros. Each savory treat comes individually wrapped so that you can easily eat it on-the-go and features a delicious dipping sauce to make them extra tasty.

Transport yourself inside your favorite fantasy movie by gathering around the table to play Labyrinth: The Board Game. You and up to four friends are tasked with guiding your character through the magnificently decorated board to rescue Toby from the goblin king.

When you’re in the mood for something sweet, treat your tastebuds to the unrivaled goodness of some edible unicorn poop candy. Each 1/2 pound bag comes filled with dozens of multi-colored jelly poop pellets that taste strikingly similar to regular Jelly Beans.

Ensure beverages remain nice and frosty until your guests want them by storing them inside this outdoor table/cooler. The base fills up with ice to keep drinks cool for hours while the top can be lifted up and used as a sturdy table for drinks and food.

Keep your electronic devices going – even if there’s no wall outlet in sight – by plugging them into this solar powered battery pack generator. It features a 500 watt-hour lithium-ion battery that recharges in just 7 hours when placed under direct sunlight.

The Jeri-Rigg anchor strap is the simple yet incredibly useful tool designed to help you in a variety of everyday tasks. Available in 4 sizes, this lightweight strap can be wrapped around nearly any pole or rod and can hold up to 3,000 pounds.

Give your home a soothing ambiance that’ll keep you happy by mellowing out to this relaxing ocean waves projector. It projects a series of calming ocean waves onto the ceiling and nearby walls to transform your room into an underwater oasis of tranquility.

Take your art from the second to the third dimension using the cool ink 3D printing pen. Instead of heating and melting, it employs photopolymers that are instantly solidified using the LED diodes on the pen, allowing you to create works of art that literally jump off the page.

America: The Cookbook is your ticket to embarking on a gastronomic journey across our great nation without ever leaving your kitchen. It covers all aspects of the history of American cuisine, in addition to featuring essays by renowned chefs and 800 home-style recipes.

Experience the future of brain teasers with the Rubik’s Futuro Cube. Apart from the obvious, this LED lit cube comes with 14 built-in games, features a multi-player mode, and comes with access to a development kit that lets you design your own games.

titleEN: The Art Of Rick And Morty Book
content: Take an inter-dimensional dive into how the show’s unique characters were created by sitting down with The Art of Rick and Morty book. It features intimate commentary from the show’s creators alongside amazing concept, process, and production art.

Ensure the kids on your block never have a peaceful night’s sleep ever again by dressing up in this It Pennywise clown costume. Modeled after Pennywise the Dancing Clown’s latest 2017 reincarnation, you’ll be a shoe-in to take the top prize for scariest outfit.

titleEN: Cast Aluminum Wood Burning Fire Pit
content: Avoid hypothermia on cold nights by cozying up to this cast aluminum wood burning fire pit. Apart from its solid construction and non-rusting aluminum exterior, it features an efficient design with an ample chamber and a large stainless steel mouth screen.

Turn bedtime into playtime with the twister bed sheets. The sheets gloriously transform your mattress into a naughty full size twister play mat so you can enjoy this classic game the way it was truly meant to be played – naked, of course!

Create a safer jumping environment for the kiddies by installing this in-ground trampoline kit. With the trampoline at ground level you’ll decrease the risk of serious injury and create a more aesthetically pleasing landscape in your backyard.

This Halloween, one-up every couple in your town – and the afterlife – by dressing up in these Beetlejuice Adam and Barbara masks. These freaky masks are modeled on the ghoulish faces created by the Maitland’s in their attempt to scare the Deetz family away from their home.

Illuminate your room with style using this levitating light bulb. This unique awe-inspiring lamp is wirelessly powered via induction while simultaneously employing magnetic levitation to create the magical effect of floating while turned on.

Keep Mr. Whiskers purring all the day long by getting him this feline face massager. The ergonomic base is outfitted with a board cushion, massage ridges, an anti-skid ring, a catnip container, and a multi-purpose massager that’ll leave your cat in ecstasy.

There’s no better house warming gift for the impatient alcoholic than this rapid beverage and wine chiller device. This handy electronic gadget quickly chills cans in just one minute and wine bottles in as little as six minutes!

Say goodbye to frayed cables once and for all by charging your devices using this indestructible kevlar cable. Compatible with both Apple and Android devices, the cable is reinforced by kevlar and is designed to be tangle resistant.

Give your nighttime dip a cool ambiance and bitchin’ soundtrack using this lightshow waterproof Bluetooth speaker. It comes with a built-in battery that can last for 12 hours on a single charge and features a cylindrical design that provides 360 degree sound and light.

Bring your favorite anti-hero from the big screen to the real world by dressing up in this Deadpool costume. This full body costume is crafted from PU leather and includes the suit, gloves, boot covers, and belt – complete with bags and harness.

Add a touch of natural beauty to your bathroom’s decor using these soap rocks. Each visually striking rock features a swirl of vivid color combinations, along with a delightful geranium moss scent, and of course it helps moisturize your skin.

Let your coworkers know who’s the queen bee at the office by sipping your coffee from this bitch mug. The clever design of the curvy handle completes the “itch” graphic on the mug that leaves nothing open to interpretation about who you really are.

Make toasty, scrumptious sandwiches in these handy toaster bags. Want to make a grilled cheese in only two minutes? No problem, these mess-free toaster bags are perfect. They’re easy to clean, keep crumbs out of the toaster, and are reusable.

Usher your home into the 21st century by installing the Lockitron Alexa enabled smart lock. This Bluetooth app-enabled lock lets you easily share keys with others to grant them temporary access and comes with a sense feature that automatically unlocks as you approach it.

titleEN: Million Dollars, But… The Card Game
content: What would you do for a million dollars? Now you can put your morals and dignity to the test by playing a round of “Million Dollars, But…”. Using a “trigger” and “rule” card, players take turns creating the most depraved scenarios imaginable for a million dollars.

Help your little Padawans one-up Anakin by having them build their own droid using this Star Wars droid inventor kit. The kit includes everything your little engineers will need to build a cool little R2 unit without any help from grown-ups.

Transform your humble abode into a haunted mansion with these holographic Halloween decorations. Once your insert the disc into your projector, your home will be flooded by a series of life-like spirits that float around to terrify anyone that walks by.

Set your Halloween party apart from the rest with help from the bubble fogger machine. It sets an eerie and surreal tone to the atmosphere with dozens of smoke-filled bubbles that cover the room with a ghastly fog once popped.

Turn your four legged friend into the cutest looking panda in town by slipping him into this adorable dog costume. Intended for small breeds, it fits over your pooch’s two front legs – transforming him into an adorable and cuddly stuffed panda bear.

Create a magical atmosphere in your bedroom by draping these fairy curtain lights over your bed. These energy efficient string lights come with eight unique lighting modes such as slow fade and twinkling – making them ideal decor for any occasion.

Find a rich and meaningful path to divination by using these Game of Thrones tarot cards. They feature exquisite artwork that depicts the series’ characters, scenes, and stories in a style that’s true to the world of dragons and gratuitous nudity.

Transform from a young buck to a decrepit old geezer in mere seconds by putting on this old man face mask. The mask is made from a comfortable and breathable fabric that wicks away moisture and comes with an ultra realistic design that’ll fool anyone.

Give your smartphone some extra eye-catching appeal by protecting it with this heat sensitive iPhone case. It features a non-slip matte texture, provides access to all of your phone’s features, and changes color depending on the temperature of your hand.

Get a nice buzz during your next scrimmage by playing with the football flask. This sporty flask holds up to 10 shots of your favorite liquid poison and is made from a tough yet soft foam material – complete with foam cap – that spirals like a dream whether it’s empty or full.

Avoid accidentally overdosing on your meds by outfitting your medicine bottles with these timer caps. These handy caps are embedded with a small LCD stopwatch that displays the time since the medicine bottle was last opened so that you know just when to take your pills.

Make someone’s day by surprising them with a custom message potato parcel. You’ll be able to send a short, totally random fifteen word message to anyone in the country – making this the ideal vessel for playing practical jokes on friends or strangers.

Behold the pinnacle of modern technology – the pancake printer! This life changing cooking appliance prints out artistically designed flapjacks with ease to create a tasty and aesthetically pleasing breakfast for the whole family to enjoy.

Drown your liver in a sea of sweet alcohol by going up against your mate for a round of this battle shots drinking game. Each player places four shot glasses in secret locations while trying to guess their enemy’s position before getting completely tanked.

Design the room of your dreams using nothing more than your creativity and these modular LEGO-like building blocks. These durable weatherproof blocks come in various sizes and colors – allowing you to build anything from desks and chairs to fun props and toys.

Quell your pizza craving by keeping a delicious slice handy using this portable pizza pouch. The triangular plastic pouch features a convenient strap so you can use it like a necklace and a sturdy zip lock seal to ensure the slice stays fresh.

Keep laundry room mishaps from ruining your clothes for good by reversing the shrinking process with this unshrinking clothing solution. It’s specially formulated to unshrink cashmere, wool, and wool blend garments in as little as thirty minutes.

Step into The Future™ of lawn care by getting yourself one of these smart automatic lawn mowers. It works in rain or shine, on smooth or rough terrain, on slopes up to 35 degrees, and automatically returns to its charging station after finishing the job.

Handle any type of situation that may arise in the wilderness by keeping the off grid survival axe by your side. Despite its compact size, it sports a sturdy construction and comes with over 30 unique features like a glass breaker, a hammer head, and a fold-out saw.

Give your sweetie a birthday present that is one to remember by wrapping yourself up in this giant red bow lingerie. This oversized polyester bow is breathable, soft to the touch, and can accommodate bra sizes ranging from an A-cup to double D’s.

Move through the water like an enchanting mythical creature by diving in with this mermaid tail swimsuit. While its design may render you motionless on land, the huge vibrantly colored fin will have you swimming faster than ever before.

Give your crusty feet a new lease on life by making them baby-smooth using this deep exfoliation foot peel. About 5 days after you place the special goo-filled booties on, dead layers of calloused skin will begin to peel off until eventually you’re left with only fresh baby skin.

Take cubicle warfare to the next level by unleashing a barrage of rubbery pain with this rubber band machine gun. This finely crafted wooden gun, holds up to 900 bands at once and comes with an on-board 6 volt electric motor that shoots 16 rubber bands per second.

What better way to spend the holiday season than by following John McClane on his latest adventure in A Die Hard Christmas book. You’ll follow the iconic action hero as he tries to rescue his wife and her coworkers when their holiday party turns into a deadly hostage situation.

Make a night of solitary drinking feel a little less lonely by serving your feline drinking buddy some wine for cats. This cleverly named White Kittendel is a delicious natural beverage made from organic beets, valerian root, and herbs like cat nip.

Explore the correlation of ideal human proportions with this Vitruvian man action figure. He comes with articulated joints so you can place him in a variety of positions, and features a paint job that makes it seem like he was torn directly out of da Vinci’s sketchbook.

Make your dishes and baked goods more mouth-watering than ever by adding some spray-on pumpkin spice into the mix. This dry spice alternative spray features no chemical additives and can be sprayed on everything from pancakes to muffins to cookies.

Discreetly carry all your gear without needing a cumbersome backpack by wearing this concealed pockets jacket. It comes with a range of differently sized pockets all over the torso with enough room to carry passports, cell phones, and tablets.

Make your office chair glide seamlessly throughout your office by replacing those cheap plastic wheels with these sleek rollerblade wheels. They’re able to support up to 400 pounds and provide a quiet and smooth glide over both carpet and tile floors.
